Worth it.

topics.body:
I just woke up.
But I needed to post this before I forgot.

Guys, I just had a Disney movie musical for a dream!
Starring Kick Buttowski, his helmet (who also seems to talk in an A.I. manner), Gunther, that blonde girl and others. A story where Kick and his friends were stuck in a blizzard and met a weird and extremely hairy old midget for a brief period. There, they trained for the upcoming International Group Musical Competition and they decided to do ice-skating. Kick believes he was better than everyone but after an incident, he decided never to skate again. As his friend left when the blizzard had subsided by riding a sled pulled by bears, Kick was left behind and started to sing a sad version of Let It Go. After fainting and being saved by the same old midget, Kick was thought a valuable lesson.

For others to trust you, you must first trust yourself.

(I made that up in the dream btw)

Kick had an epiphany and rode an albino wolf to some stage/orchestra that also was in a blizzard. When he met his friends, they still had sour feelings for him and he promised to make it up. His helmet gave him an idea and he decided to ice-skate in front of everyone at the nearby lake during the blizzard. At first it was hard but then he was helped by his friends who was called by his helmet via Internet. Everyone awed and cheered for them, even though it was hard for them to see. After gaining enough courage and friendship, the entire lake turned into solid ice and the blizzard disappeared. Kick went on with the musical (I can't remember the song but I'm pretty sure I wrote the song in my sleep) with the encouragement of his helmet and won the competition and his friends' trust.

Later, they entered a school bus and was hypnotised by that weird woman from the magic school bus and tortured a group of contestants who were tied up at the moment by singing ridiculous songs. 

This part kinda went off track compared to the rest of the dream.

And now I'm going to take a bath.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

Oh yeah, I almost forgot!
The old midget looked a lot like a Digimon.
He was round and had a lot of white fur covering practically everywhere.
